questions.quote: We don't want anything to happen to you Mr. Pitt. We want you to live a long, long time.
So if you call and ask if you have the job, you might lose the job.
No I don't! In fact, if even one corpuscles of that blood should find it's way across that hall I will freak out on you Kramer! Freak out.
"No No... That's not him. That's the guy who gave me... Jimmy's number."
I don't know why we didn't think of this before. We just could call TV Guide.
I don't keep real coffee in here, I get my coffee on the outside!  Yeah?!
Oh, come on, Jerry. If everybody knew everybody, we wouldn't have the problems we have in the world today. Well, you don't rob somebody, if you know their name!
Well, it's only a year. That's not so bad. We'll be out in a year, and then we'll be back
This is so exciting! Look, I have goosebumps!  Touch! Touch them!  I've never been to a comedy club before!
The "Jerry"'s back on - the TV show! George and I are moving to California!
